scripts.install-projects-win: (npm install) && (cd common && npm install) & (cd ../api-contracts && npm install) & (cd ../api-client && npm install) & (cd ../subscriptions && npm install) & (cd ../client && npm install) & (cd ../client-admin && npm install) & (cd ../subscriptions-api && npm install) & (cd ../storage-dynamodb && npm install) & (cd ../security-extensions-lambda && npm install)
scripts.install-projects-ci: (npm ci) && (cd common && npm ci) && (cd api-contracts && npm ci) && (cd api-client && npm ci) && (cd subscriptions && npm ci)  && (cd client && npm ci) && (cd client-admin && npm ci) && (cd subscriptions-api && npm ci) && (cd storage-dynamodb && npm ci) && (cd security-extensions-lambda && npm ci)
scripts.dev:subscriptions-api-dynamodb: cd subscriptions-api && serverless dynamodb install && serverless dynamodb start
scripts.production-build:client: cd client && GENERATE_SOURCEMAP=false npm run build
scripts.production-build:client-admin: cd client-admin && GENERATE_SOURCEMAP=false npm run build
scripts.install-and-build-production: (npm run install-projects-ci) && (npm run build) && (npm run production-build)
